review: The Fire TV Stick was easy to install and is very easy to use.  It works with a lot of different applications / services.  The only small negative part of it is that I have yet to find a way to stream YouTube through it.  Other than that, it's perfect!  I love watching Netflix with it and the remote is so easy to use.

review: Was probably 5 star when I first bought it, but now only 2 stars. The thing I do the most is stream Netflix. However, there is a known issue with Netflix stuttering on the Fire TV stick (just google it) that no amount of resets, re-downloads, or reboots will fix. The image will freeze while the sound keeps going, then the image will unfreeze and speed up to catch up with the sound. I am sick and tired of dealing with this especially during action sequences. Everything else about the stick seems to work ok, but when the primary streaming service doesn't work well, I draw the line. I will be selling this and buying a Roku 3.
author: sakenobi18

review: I have Apple TV as well as an Amazon Fire TV Stick and I definitely prefer Apple TV. My biggest frustration lies with the apps on the Fire Stick; they don't work consistently. For instance, after choosing a show or movie in both HBO GO and Netflix, it won't play and immediately goes back to the home page. Very frustrating! Just save yourself the frustration, pay the extra $30 and just get the Apple TV.
